Introducing the second-generation Apple AirPods Pro, a leap forward in audio technology. Notably, these cutting-edge earbuds now feature a Type C charging port, ensuring faster and more versatile power replenishment. Intelligent feature like conversational awareness and conversational boost helping you to stay in a conversation while lowering the music volume and improving the volume whenever the conversation is ended. These sleek marvels deliver lossless audio quality, thanks to their robust construction and the inclusion of the advanced H2 chipset. Keeps your hearing protected with "hearing protection" feature by conducting hearing tests. With active noise cancellation, Siri support, and dust resistance, these AirPods Pro promise the ultimate auditory journey. Immerse yourself in a world of pure sound and convenience with the new universal Type C charging capability.

AirPods Pro 2nd Gen USB‚ÄêC Features
Universal USB-C charging case is introduced to this AirPods Pro;
Additional dust resistance is also added to protect it in any situation;
Support for lossless audio with Apple's upcoming Vision Pro headset;
Constructed with H2 Chipset for an immersive audio performance ;
Marvelous Active Noise Cancellation for peaceful listening experience;
Keeps your surrounding sound aware with conversational awareness and conversational boost;
Pro-level ANC with transparency mode helps you reduce outer noise better;
Becomes your hearing partner for those facing moderate hearing loss;
Improve personalized listening via a dynamic spatial audio system;
Incredible battery life for an impressive and prolonged audio experience;
Non-stop SIRI support (Voice Assistant) makes it very convenient ;
Quick switching & improved touch control make it flawless.

Apple AirPods Pro (2nd Generation)

Apple AirPods Pro (2nd gen) is one of the most revolutionary products from Apple that practically paved the way for the True Wireless Stereo earbuds. The second-generation AirPods Pro takes things a step further. Building on the success of the originals, these earbuds boast a range of improvements, from superior sound quality to a more versatile charging experience. Let's dive into the feature set that makes the second-gen AirPods Pro a compelling choice for Apple users and audiophiles.

Feature of Apple AirPods Pro

At the heart of the 2nd generation AirPods Pro lies the powerful Apple H2 chip. This chip elevates both noise cancellation and audio processing. Active Noise Cancellation (ANC) is now twice as effective as the previous generation, creating an immersive listening experience free from distractions. Conversely, Transparency mode allows you to hear your surroundings clearly, ideal for staying aware during commutes or conversations.

Personalized Audio for Every Ear

Adaptive Audio tailors the sound to your specific needs. It dynamically adjusts the frequencies based on the fit of the earbuds in your ears, ensuring a consistently rich and balanced soundscape. Additionally, Personalized Spatial Audio with dynamic head tracking creates a three-dimensional listening experience. Imagine feeling like you're in the center of the music or movie, with sounds seemingly emanating from all around you.

Control at Your Fingertips

The familiar touch controls on the stems of the AirPods Pro let you manage playback, answer calls, and switch between ANC and Transparency mode with ease. Conversation Awareness allows you to focus on a conversation without removing your earbuds. It lowers the volume of music or media while amplifying voices, perfect for quick chats.

Seamless Connectivity and Power

Automatic Switching ensures a smooth transition between Apple devices. Whether you're using your iPhone, iPad, or Mac, the AirPods Pro connect effortlessly. Dust, sweat, and water resistance provide peace of mind during workouts or unexpected splashes.

Extended Listening and a New Charging Option

Enjoy up to 6 hours of listening time on a single charge, with the charging case extending that to a total of 30 hours. The biggest change that comes with the MagSafe Charging Case. This new case offers faster charging and broader compatibility with USB-C chargers you might already own. The case also features a built-in speaker for locating misplaced AirPods and a handy lanyard loop for added security.

AirPods Pro and the Environment

AirPods Pro with MagSafe Charging Case (USB‚ÄëC) are designed with the following features to reduce their environmental impact:

Made with better materials

100% recycled gold in the plating of multiple printed circuit boards

100% recycled rare earth elements in all magnets

100% recycled aluminum in the hinge of the MagSafe Charging Case

100% recycled tin in the solder of multiple printed circuit boards

35% or more recycled plastic in multiple components

Energy efficient

Meets U.S. Department of Energy requirements for battery charger systems

Smarter chemistry

Mercury-, BFR-, PVC-, and beryllium‚Äëfree

Green manufacturing

Apple‚Äôs Zero Waste Program helps suppliers eliminate waste sent to landfill

All final assembly supplier sites are transitioning to 100% renewable energy for Apple production

Responsible packaging

100% of virgin wood fiber comes from responsibly managed forests

98% or more fiber-based packaging

Apple Trade In

Apple Trade In lets you recycle any Apple device at any Apple Store and on apple.com for free.

product_name: Ultrapods Max True Wireless Earbuds - Bluetooth 5.3 with Display
description: Enjoy crystal-clear audio with the Ultrapods Max True Wireless Earbuds. Featuring Bluetooth 5.3 for a stable connection, these earbuds offer a transparent design and digital display for a modern touch. With long battery life and immersive sound quality, they are perfect for music, calls, and gaming.

product_name: Ultrapods Pro True Wireless Earbuds with Display Transparent Design, Bluetooth 5.3 Water Proof
description:
1. SVE AI Call Noise Reduction: The Ultrapods Pro come equipped with SVE AI technology that actively reduces background noise during calls, ensuring crystal-clear conversations no matter where you are.

2. 3D LED Digital Display: Witness your music in a whole new dimension with the mesmerizing 3D LED digital display. Not only do these earbuds sound amazing, but they also look incredibly stylish.

3. Chip Bestechnic BES2600IHC: Powered by the advanced Bestechnic BES2600IHC chipset, these earbuds deliver superior audio quality, fast connectivity, and remarkable power efficiency.

4. High-Quality Audio Codecs: With support for SBC and AAC audio codecs, the Ultrapods Pro guarantee a dynamic and immersive sound experience.

5. Bluetooth 5.3: Stay effortlessly connected with the latest Bluetooth 5.3 technology, ensuring a stable and efficient connection to your devices.

6. Coaxial Dual-Motion Speaker: Enjoy a rich, full-bodied sound with the coaxial dual-motion speaker system that provides balanced and accurate audio.

7. Transparent Charging Case: The 500mAh transparent charging case not only keeps your Ultrapods Pro secure and charged but also adds a touch of sophistication with its cool atmosphere light.

8. Long-Lasting Battery: These earbuds boast an incredible battery life, offering up to 16 hours of music playback or 6 hours of call time on a single charge.

9. IPX4 Waterproof: Designed to withstand the elements, the Ultrapods Pro are rated IPX4 waterproof, making them the ideal companions for your active lifestyle.

10. Active Noise Cancellation: Immerse yourself in your music without distractions. The active noise cancellation feature ensures that you hear every detail of your favorite tunes, no matter the environment.

product_name: Ultrapods Pro True Wireless Earbuds with Display Transparent Design, Bluetooth 5.3 Water Proof
description:
1. SVE AI Call Noise Reduction: The Ultrapods Pro come equipped with SVE AI technology that actively reduces background noise during calls, ensuring crystal-clear conversations no matter where you are.

2. 3D LED Digital Display: Witness your music in a whole new dimension with the mesmerizing 3D LED digital display. Not only do these earbuds sound amazing, but they also look incredibly stylish.

3. Chip Bestechnic BES2600IHC: Powered by the advanced Bestechnic BES2600IHC chipset, these earbuds deliver superior audio quality, fast connectivity, and remarkable power efficiency.

4. High-Quality Audio Codecs: With support for SBC and AAC audio codecs, the Ultrapods Pro guarantee a dynamic and immersive sound experience.

5. Bluetooth 5.3: Stay effortlessly connected with the latest Bluetooth 5.3 technology, ensuring a stable and efficient connection to your devices.

6. Coaxial Dual-Motion Speaker: Enjoy a rich, full-bodied sound with the coaxial dual-motion speaker system that provides balanced and accurate audio.

7. Transparent Charging Case: The 500mAh transparent charging case not only keeps your Ultrapods Pro secure and charged but also adds a touch of sophistication with its cool atmosphere light.

8. Long-Lasting Battery: These earbuds boast an incredible battery life, offering up to 16 hours of music playback or 6 hours of call time on a single charge.

9. IPX4 Waterproof: Designed to withstand the elements, the Ultrapods Pro are rated IPX4 waterproof, making them the ideal companions for your active lifestyle.

10. Active Noise Cancellation: Immerse yourself in your music without distractions. The active noise cancellation feature ensures that you hear every detail of your favorite tunes, no matter the environment.

product_name: Airpods A9 Pro Earbuds 2024 TWS In-Ear Earbuds ANC/ENC Wireless Earphones LED Touch Screen Noise Cancelling LED
description:
The Airpods A9 Pro 2024 TWS In-Ear Earbuds deliver premium audio performance with a custom high-excursion Apple driver and high dynamic range amplifier. Featuring Active Noise Cancellation (ANC) and Environmental Noise Cancellation (ENC), these earbuds offer a truly immersive sound experience. The adaptive audio technology ensures optimal sound based on your environment, while Transparency mode allows you to stay aware of your surroundings.

Key features include Personalized Spatial Audio with dynamic head tracking, Adaptive EQ, and Loud Noise Reduction. The dual beamforming microphones and inward-facing mic provide clear voice quality, even in noisy environments. The earbuds are equipped with a skin-detect sensor, motion-detecting accelerometer, and speech-detecting accelerometer for seamless control.

With touch control functionality, you can easily manage music, calls, and volume adjustments. Integrated with the Apple H2 headphone chip and Apple U1 chip in the MagSafe charging case (USB-C), the Airpods A9 Pro offer a quick and efficient charging solution. These earbuds are also dust, sweat, and water-resistant (IP54), making them suitable for active use.

The lightweight design ensures comfort for long listening sessions, and the charging case is compact and portable, providing up to 5 hours of battery life. Ideal for both casual listening and intense workouts, the Airpods A9 Pro earbuds combine style, functionality, and advanced features for an exceptional audio experience.

product_name: M10 TWS Earphone 9D Stereo LED Digital Display Touch CVC8.0 Digital Noise Reduction Technology - Earphone
description:
The "M10 BT wireless TWS Bluetooth earbuds V5.1" are a pair of wireless earphones designed to provide an immersive and convenient audio experience. Here's a description of their key features:

1. Advanced Bluetooth 5.1 Connectivity: These wireless earbuds utilize Bluetooth 5.1 technology, offering a stable and efficient wireless connection to your devices. It ensures fast and reliable pairing with your smartphone, tablet, or other Bluetooth-enabled devices.

2. True Wireless Stereo (TWS) Design: The TWS design means that each earbud functions independently, allowing you to use them individually or together. This flexibility is great for various scenarios, such as taking calls with one earbud or enjoying stereo sound for music and movies.

3. High-Quality Sound: The M10 BT earbuds are engineered to deliver high-quality audio with clear trebles and deep bass. Whether you're listening to music, watching videos, or making phone calls, you can expect crisp and immersive sound quality.

4. Comfortable and Secure Fit: These earbuds are designed for comfort and a secure fit. They often come with multiple ear tip sizes to ensure a snug fit that stays in place, even during active pursuits like workouts or running.

5. Touch Controls: Many wireless earbuds, including the M10 BT, feature touch-sensitive controls for easy and intuitive operation. You can play/pause music, adjust volume, answer/end calls, and even activate voice assistants with simple touch gestures.

6. Noise Isolation: The earbuds often come with passive noise isolation to block out external noise, allowing you to focus on your audio content without disturbances.

7. Long Battery Life: These earbuds typically offer several hours of playback time on a single charge. Additionally, the included charging case provides extra battery life, making them suitable for extended use.

8. Built-in Microphone: The built-in microphone allows for hands-free phone calls. You can make and receive calls without removing the earbuds.

9. Compact Charging Case: The charging case not only protects the earbuds but also serves as a portable charger. It's convenient for on-the-go use, ensuring your earbuds are always charged and ready to use.

10. Compatibility: The M10 BT wireless earbuds are compatible with a wide range of devices, including smartphones, tablets, and laptops from various manufacturers.

These earbuds are designed for users who seek a wireless audio solution that combines convenience, sound quality, and versatility. To get specific details about the M10 BT model, including its battery life, water resistance rating, and any additional features, it's recommended to refer to the product manual or the manufacturer's official website.

product_name: Ultrapods Pro True Wireless Earbuds with Display Transparent Design, Bluetooth 5.3 Water Proof
description:
1. SVE AI Call Noise Reduction: The Ultrapods Pro come equipped with SVE AI technology that actively reduces background noise during calls, ensuring crystal-clear conversations no matter where you are.

2. 3D LED Digital Display: Witness your music in a whole new dimension with the mesmerizing 3D LED digital display. Not only do these earbuds sound amazing, but they also look incredibly stylish.

3. Chip Bestechnic BES2600IHC: Powered by the advanced Bestechnic BES2600IHC chipset, these earbuds deliver superior audio quality, fast connectivity, and remarkable power efficiency.

5. Bluetooth 5.3: Stay effortlessly connected with the latest Bluetooth 5.3 technology, ensuring a stable and efficient connection to your devices.

6. Coaxial Dual-Motion Speaker: Enjoy a rich, full-bodied sound with the coaxial dual-motion speaker system that provides balanced and accurate audio.

7. Transparent Charging Case: The 500mAh transparent charging case not only keeps your Ultrapods Pro secure and charged but also adds a touch of sophistication with its cool atmosphere light.

8. Long-Lasting Battery: These earbuds boast an incredible battery life, offering up to 16 hours of music playback or 6 hours of call time on a single charge.

9. IPX4 Waterproof: Designed to withstand the elements, the Ultrapods Pro are rated IPX4 waterproof, making them the ideal companions for your active lifestyle.

10. Active Noise Cancellation: Immerse yourself in your music without distractions. The active noise cancellation feature ensures that you hear every detail of your favorite tunes, no matter the environment.

description: Enjoy crystal-clear audio with the Ultrapods Max True Wireless Earbuds. Featuring Bluetooth 5.3 for a stable connection, these earbuds offer a transparent design and digital display for a modern touch. With long battery life and immersive sound quality, they are perfect for music, calls, and gaming.

product_name: Ultrapods Pro True Wireless Earbuds with Display Transparent Design, Bluetooth 5.3 Water Proof
description:
1. SVE AI Call Noise Reduction: The Ultrapods Pro come equipped with SVE AI technology that actively reduces background noise during calls, ensuring crystal-clear conversations no matter where you are.

2. 3D LED Digital Display: Witness your music in a whole new dimension with the mesmerizing 3D LED digital display. Not only do these earbuds sound amazing, but they also look incredibly stylish.

3. Chip Bestechnic BES2600IHC: Powered by the advanced Bestechnic BES2600IHC chipset, these earbuds deliver superior audio quality, fast connectivity, and remarkable power efficiency.

4. High-Quality Audio Codecs: With support for SBC and AAC audio codecs, the Ultrapods Pro guarantee a dynamic and immersive sound experience.

5. Bluetooth 5.3: Stay effortlessly connected with the latest Bluetooth 5.3 technology, ensuring a stable and efficient connection to your devices.

6. Coaxial Dual-Motion Speaker: Enjoy a rich, full-bodied sound with the coaxial dual-motion speaker system that provides balanced and accurate audio.

7. Transparent Charging Case: The 500mAh transparent charging case not only keeps your Ultrapods Pro secure and charged but also adds a touch of sophistication with its cool atmosphere light.

8. Long-Lasting Battery: These earbuds boast an incredible battery life, offering up to 16 hours of music playback or 6 hours of call time on a single charge.

9. IPX4 Waterproof: Designed to withstand the elements, the Ultrapods Pro are rated IPX4 waterproof, making them the ideal companions for your active lifestyle.

10. Active Noise Cancellation: Immerse yourself in your music without distractions. The active noise cancellation feature ensures that you hear every detail of your favorite tunes, no matter the environment.

product_name: SoundPEATS T3 Pro Earbuds 35dB Active Noice Canceling BT5.4 True Wireless App Support Dual ENC Mic Multi Connection Bluetooth Earphones with ANC
description:
Hybrid Active Noise Cancellation (ANC):
The T3 Pro offers hybrid ANC technology, which helps reduce ambient noise for a more immersive listening experience, especially in noisy environments like public transport or offices.
It can cut down on external distractions significantly, allowing for better sound clarity.
Sound Quality:
The T3 Pro features a¬†12mm dynamic driver, delivering deep bass and clear treble. SoundPEATS aims for a balanced sound profile with good detail and punchy bass.
Dual Mic for Clear Calls:
The earbuds come with dual microphones that enhance voice clarity during calls, helping filter out environmental noise for better communication.
Low Latency Mode:
Ideal for watching videos or gaming, the T3 Pro supports low-latency technology to minimize audio-visual syncing issues, making it great for media consumption.
Bluetooth 5.3:
The earbuds support Bluetooth 5.3, which offers improved connection stability, better range, and faster pairing, as well as reduced power consumption compared to earlier Bluetooth versions.
IPX4 Water Resistance:
The T3 Pro is rated IPX4, which means it can handle splashes of water and sweat, making it a suitable option for workouts or outdoor use in light rain.
Touch Controls:
The earbuds feature touch controls for managing playback, calls, and adjusting ANC modes, adding a level of convenience for users.
Battery Life:
With ANC on, you can expect around¬†6 hours¬†of continuous playback on a full charge, and with the charging case, the total battery life extends to around¬†24 hours.
The case supports¬†USB-C charging, which allows for faster and more efficient charging.
Comfort and Fit:
The earbuds come with multiple ear tips to ensure a secure and comfortable fit for different ear sizes. The lightweight design ensures they stay in place even during physical activities.

product_name: Ultrapods Pro True Wireless Earbuds with Display Transparent Design, Bluetooth 5.3 Water Proof
description:
1. SVE AI Call Noise Reduction: The Ultrapods Pro come equipped with SVE AI technology that actively reduces background noise during calls, ensuring crystal-clear conversations no matter where you are.

2. 3D LED Digital Display: Witness your music in a whole new dimension with the mesmerizing 3D LED digital display. Not only do these earbuds sound amazing, but they also look incredibly stylish.

3. Chip Bestechnic BES2600IHC: Powered by the advanced Bestechnic BES2600IHC chipset, these earbuds deliver superior audio quality, fast connectivity, and remarkable power efficiency.

4. High-Quality Audio Codecs: With support for SBC and AAC audio codecs, the Ultrapods Pro guarantee a dynamic and immersive sound experience.

5. Bluetooth 5.3: Stay effortlessly connected with the latest Bluetooth 5.3 technology, ensuring a stable and efficient connection to your devices.

6. Coaxial Dual-Motion Speaker: Enjoy a rich, full-bodied sound with the coaxial dual-motion speaker system that provides balanced and accurate audio.

7. Transparent Charging Case: The 500mAh transparent charging case not only keeps your Ultrapods Pro secure and charged but also adds a touch of sophistication with its cool atmosphere light.

8. Long-Lasting Battery: These earbuds boast an incredible battery life, offering up to 16 hours of music playback or 6 hours of call time on a single charge.

9. IPX4 Waterproof: Designed to withstand the elements, the Ultrapods Pro are rated IPX4 waterproof, making them the ideal companions for your active lifestyle.

10. Active Noise Cancellation: Immerse yourself in your music without distractions. The active noise cancellation feature ensures that you hear every detail of your favorite tunes, no matter the environment.

AirPods Pro with active noise cancellation technology
The AirPods Pro, 2nd Generation, redefines a world of audio excellence. Whether commuting, hitting the gym, or just lounging around the house, these earbuds provide crystal-clear treble and well-rounded bass for your top listening experience.
Effortless and Easy
The latest wireless Bluetooth technology in the AirPods Pro, 2nd Generation, allows it to pair quickly and swiftly with your device. The wireless works from as far away as 10 meters, enabling any user to be mobile without restrictions from wires. That tremendous range means you can listen to your audio while your device remains across the room. The ease of connectivity with other devices increases the user experience since one can suddenly share music or make a call without giving it a second thought.
Fashionably Comfortable Down to the Details
Style has been infused into functionality in the design of the second-generation AirPods Pro. They are made to be stylish and versatile companions with any outfit and occasion, complemented by an elegant white finish. The lightweight structure ensures a snugger fit, making them perfect for extended use. From your most challenging workout sessions to daily usage, these earbuds stay perfectly fitted and offer an unobtrusive listening experience. With the different sizes of ear tips, you will achieve the fit you need for ultimate comfort and performance in sound.
Price and Availability
Competitively priced, the AirPods Pro ANC Master Copy would be attractive to anyone looking for a pair of top-quality wireless earbuds in Bangladesh. This is due to active noise cancellation technology combined with an immersive sound experience. The price will be reasonably justified by the value created with advanced features that potential customers will make; hence, the AirPods Pro is worth investing in for any audio lover. Without a doubt, these earbuds are about to make many users' daily audio experiences more relaxed and more reliable.

description:
HOCO EQ2 Plus True Wireless Earbuds:

Features:

The HOCO EQ2 Plus is the perfect choice for music lovers and busy individuals who need clear sound, comfort, and long-lasting performance. Featuring the latest Bluetooth 5.4 technology, these earbuds offer stable connectivity with minimal dropouts, low power usage, and seamless pairing with all Bluetooth-enabled devices.

One standout feature is the clear LED battery indicator on the charging case. This allows you to monitor the battery in real time so you‚Äôre never caught off guard with a dead earbud. Moreover, the earbuds deliver 7 hours of playback on a single charge, and the 320mAh case provides multiple recharges, giving you up to 180 hours of standby time ‚Äî ideal for all-day use.

Additionally, the HOCO EQ2Plus is designed with comfort in mind. Each earbud weighs just 4g and fits snugly in your ears, making them perfect for workouts, commutes, or extended use. The compact case (measuring only 58√ó49√ó25mm) easily fits in your pocket or bag.

Enjoy hassle-free controls with smart touch features. Easily manage your music, answer or end calls, and activate voice assistants like Siri or Google Assistant with a few taps. The master-slave switching function also allows for single-earbud use without affecting performance.

product_name: SoundPEATS T3 Pro Earbuds 35dB Active Noice Canceling BT5.4 True Wireless App Support Dual ENC Mic Multi Connection Bluetooth Earphones with ANC
description:
Hybrid Active Noise Cancellation (ANC):
The T3 Pro offers hybrid ANC technology, which helps reduce ambient noise for a more immersive listening experience, especially in noisy environments like public transport or offices.
It can cut down on external distractions significantly, allowing for better sound clarity.
Sound Quality:
The T3 Pro features a¬†12mm dynamic driver, delivering deep bass and clear treble. SoundPEATS aims for a balanced sound profile with good detail and punchy bass.
Dual Mic for Clear Calls:
The earbuds come with dual microphones that enhance voice clarity during calls, helping filter out environmental noise for better communication.
Low Latency Mode:
Ideal for watching videos or gaming, the T3 Pro supports low-latency technology to minimize audio-visual syncing issues, making it great for media consumption.
Bluetooth 5.3:
The earbuds support Bluetooth 5.3, which offers improved connection stability, better range, and faster pairing, as well as reduced power consumption compared to earlier Bluetooth versions.
IPX4 Water Resistance:
The T3 Pro is rated IPX4, which means it can handle splashes of water and sweat, making it a suitable option for workouts or outdoor use in light rain.
Touch Controls:
The earbuds feature touch controls for managing playback, calls, and adjusting ANC modes, adding a level of convenience for users.
Battery Life:
With ANC on, you can expect around¬†6 hours¬†of continuous playback on a full charge, and with the charging case, the total battery life extends to around¬†24 hours.
The case supports¬†USB-C charging, which allows for faster and more efficient charging.
Comfort and Fit:
The earbuds come with multiple ear tips to ensure a secure and comfortable fit for different ear sizes. The lightweight design ensures they stay in place even during physical activities.

product_name: Anker Soundcore R50i True Wireless Earbuds
description:
Features of Anker SoundCore R50i
Immerse yourself in sound.

The Anker SoundCore R50i True Wireless Earbuds deliver powerful sound with deep bass and clear highs thanks to their 10mm drivers. With 22 preset EQ options in the Soundcore app, you can customize the sound to your liking.

Listen all day long.

The SoundCore R50i earbuds offer up to 10 hours of playtime on a single charge, and the charging case provides an additional 20 hours of playtime. That‚Äôs a total of 30 hours of playtime, so you can listen to your favorite music all day long without having to worry about running out of battery.

A fit that‚Äôs as comfortable as it is secure.

The SoundCore R50i earbuds are designed with a lightweight and ergonomic fit that ensures a comfortable and secure fit for all-day wear. The silicone ear tips provide a good seal, which helps to block out ambient noise and improve the sound quality.

Built for all-weather use.

The SoundCore R50i earbuds are IPX5 water resistant, so you can wear them in the rain or while working out without having to worry about damaging them.

Touch controls for easy music and call management.

The SoundCore R50i earbuds feature touch controls that allow you to easily manage your music and calls without having to take out your phone. You can use the touch controls to play/pause music, skip tracks, adjust the volume, and answer/end calls.

Compatible with Android and iOS devices.

The SoundCore R50i earbuds are compatible with both Android and iOS devices, so you can use them with any smartphone or tablet.
